participant_abstract.sent: The meeting brought together our final ideas and solutions well.

The product was evaluated well and also revaluated well with corrections made so that the final product fitted well into our specifications are also are budget which was only revealed in the last meeting.
Everybody contibuted well to this last meeting perhaps more so than in others.

participant_decisions.sent: The final prototype was decided upon and any problems with initial prototype resolved so that it was within budget.

participant_problems.sent: Problems were resolved in the reevaluation period.
